languages.text: "Нам с вами многое предстоит обсудить. Например, куда мы направимся теперь. Во тьме неизведанного еще много подобных тварей, и я намерен отыскать их. Вы со мной?" {n}Угощение Ксавьера темное, как просторы непокоренной Человечеством вселенной, и крепкое, как вера праведника. Простой солдатский амасек в простой солдатской фляжке, украшенной аквилой.{/n}

"We have much to discuss, you and I. Our next destination, for one thing. The darkness of the unknown hides many more such beasts, and I intend to find every last one of them. Are you with me?" {n}Xavier's drink is as dark as the expanses of the galaxy yet unconquered by Humanity and as strong as the faith of the righteous. Ordinary amasec in a soldier's flask, unadorned save for the Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нам с вами многое предстоит обсудить. Например, куда мы направимся теперь. Во тьме неизведанного еще много подобных тварей, и я намерен отыскать их. Вы со мной?" {n}Угощение Ксавьера темное, как просторы непокоренной Человечеством вселенной, и крепкое, как вера праведника. Простой солдатский амасек в простой солдатской фляжке, украшенной аквилой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We have much to discuss. Where we will be going now, for example. There are a lot of similar beasts inside the darkness of the unknown, and I plan on finding them all. Are you with me?" {n} Xavier's treat is as dark as the expanse of the universe still unconquered by the humanity, and as strong as the faith of a saint. Plain amasec in a plain soldier's flask, decorated with an Aquila.{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "We have much to discuss. Where we will be going now, for example. There are a lot of similar beasts inside the darkness of the unknown, and I plan on finding them all. traits.locale_text: "We have much to discuss, you and I. Our next destination, for one thing. The darkness of the unknown hides many more such beasts, and I intend to find every last one of them. Are you with me?" {n}Xavier's drink is as dark as the expanses of the galaxy yet unconquered by Humanity and as strong as the faith of the righteous. Ordinary amasec in a soldier's flask, unadorned save for the Aquila.{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Nous avons beaucoup de sujets à aborder ; notre prochaine destination, par exemple. Il existe un grand nombre de bêtes semblables dans les ténèbres de l'inconnu et je compte bien les trouver toutes. Puis-je compter sur vous ? » {n}Le remontant de Xavier est aussi sombre que les étendues de la galaxie inexplorées par l'humanité et aussi fort que la foi des vertueux. De l'amasec ordinaire dans une flasque de soldat, décorée simplement d'un Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have much to discuss, you and I. Our next destination, for one thing. The darkness of the unknown hides many more such beasts, and I intend to find every last one of them. Are you with me?" {n}Xavier's drink is as dark as the expanses of the galaxy yet unconquered by Humanity and as strong as the faith of the righteous. Ordinary amasec in a soldier's flask, unadorned save for the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons beaucoup de sujets à aborder ; notre prochaine destination, par exemple. Il existe un grand nombre de bêtes semblables dans les ténèbres de l'inconnu et je compte bien les trouver toutes. Puis-je compter sur vous ? » {n}Le remontant de Xavier est aussi sombre que les étendues de la galaxie inexplorées par l'humanité et aussi fort que la foi des vertueux. De l'amasec ordinaire dans une flasque de soldat, décorée simplement d'un Aquila.{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Usted y yo tenemos mucho de lo que hablar. Nuestro próximo destino, para empezar. Hay muchas bestias similares ocultas en la negrura de lo desconocido, y tengo intención de encontrarlas todas. ¿Vendrá conmigo?». {n}El licor de Xavier es tan oscuro como las regiones aún inexploradas del universo y tan fuerte como la fe de los honrados. Es amasec corriente en la petaca de un soldado, decorada únicamente con el Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have much to discuss, you and I. Our next destination, for one thing. The darkness of the unknown hides many more such beasts, and I intend to find every last one of them. Are you with me?" {n}Xavier's drink is as dark as the expanses of the galaxy yet unconquered by Humanity and as strong as the faith of the righteous. Ordinary amasec in a soldier's flask, unadorned save for the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tenemos mucho de lo que hablar. Lo que haremos a partir de ahora, para empezar. Hay muchas bestias similares ocultas en la negrura de lo desconocido, y tengo intención de encontrarlas todas. ¿Vendrá conmigo?». {n}El licor de Xavier es tan oscuro como las regiones aún inexploradas del universo y tan fuerte como la fe de un santo. Es amasec corriente en la petaca corriente de un soldado, decorada con el Aquila.{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “还有很多事情要讨论，你我之间。比如说，我们接下来的目的地。在那片未知的黑暗之中，还有很多像这样的怪物，我打算把它们全都找出来。你愿意和我一起来吗？”{n}希维尔瓶中的酒，就像人类尚未征服的浩瀚星海一样黑暗，也像正义之人的信仰一样坚定。朴素的阿玛塞克酒倒在了普通士兵用的酒杯中，酒杯上装饰着帝国双头鹰的徽记。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have much to discuss, you and I. Our next destination, for one thing. The darkness of the unknown hides many more such beasts, and I intend to find every last one of them. Are you with me?" {n}Xavier's drink is as dark as the expanses of the galaxy yet unconquered by Humanity and as strong as the faith of the righteous. Ordinary amasec in a soldier's flask, unadorned save for the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们还有很多事情要讨论。比如说，接下来该去什么地方。在那片未知的黑暗之中，还有很多类似的怪物，我打算把它们全都找出来。你愿意和我一起来吗？”{n}希维尔瓶中的酒，就像人类尚未征服的浩瀚宇宙一样黑暗，也像圣人的信仰一样坚定。朴素的阿玛塞克酒倒在了普通士兵用的酒杯里，酒杯上装饰着帝国双头鹰的徽记。{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Wir beide haben viel zu besprechen. Unser nächstes Ziel zum Beispiel. Die Dunkelheit des Unbekannten verbirgt viele solche Bestien, und werde jede Einzelne von ihnen finden. Seid Ihr an meiner Seite?" {n} Xaviers Getränk ist so dunkel wie die Weiten der von den Menschen noch unerforschten Galaxie und so stark wie der Glaube der Rechtschaffenen. Gewöhnlicher in einer bis auf den Aquila schmucklosen Feldflasche eines Soldaten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have much to discuss, you and I. Our next destination, for one thing. The darkness of the unknown hides many more such beasts, and I intend to find every last one of them. Are you with me?" {n}Xavier's drink is as dark as the expanses of the galaxy yet unconquered by Humanity and as strong as the faith of the righteous. Ordinary amasec in a soldier's flask, unadorned save for the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben viel zu besprechen. Wohin wir nun gehen, beispielsweise. Es gibt viele ähnliche Bestien in der Dunkelheit des Unbekannten, und ich habe vor, sie alle zu finden. Seid Ihr dabei?" {n} Xaviers Drohung ist so dunkel wie die Weite des von den Menschen noch unerforschten Universums und so stark wie der Glaube eines Heiligen. Einfacher Amasec in einer einfachen Soldatenflascheh, die mit einem Aquila verziert ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「我々には、話し合うべきことがたくさんある。例えば、次の行き先についてだ。未知の闇の中には似たような獣がたくさんいて、私はそのすべてを見つけるつもりだ。私に同行するか？」{n}ザビエルの傲慢は、人類がまだ征服していない宇宙のエクスパンスのように暗く、同時に聖人の信仰のように強いものだった。平凡なアマセックの入った兵士のフラスコには、アクィラがあしらわれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have much to discuss, you and I. Our next destination, for one thing. The darkness of the unknown hides many more such beasts, and I intend to find every last one of them. Are you with me?" {n}Xavier's drink is as dark as the expanses of the galaxy yet unconquered by Humanity and as strong as the faith of the righteous. Ordinary amasec in a soldier's flask, unadorned save for the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々には、話し合うべきことがたくさんある。例えば、次の行き先についてだ。未知の闇の中には似たような獣がたくさんいて、私はそのすべてを見つけるつもりだ。私に同行するか？」{n}ザビエルの傲慢は、人類がまだ征服していない宇宙のエクスパンスのように暗く、同時に聖人の信仰のように強いものだった。平凡なアマセックの入った兵士のフラスコには、アクィラがあしらわれていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "İkimizin konuşacak çok şeyi var. Sıradaki istikametimiz mesela. Bilinmeyenin karanlığı daha böyle birçok canavarı gizliyor ve onların hepsini bulmak istiyorum. Benimle misin?" {n}Xavier'in içeceği, galaksinin henüz İnsanlık tarafından fethedilmemiş genişlikleri kadar karanlık ve haklıların inancı kadar sert. Bir askerin şişesindeki sıradan bir amasek, Çift Başlı Kartal dışında gayet sade.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have much to discuss, you and I. Our next destination, for one thing. The darkness of the unknown hides many more such beasts, and I intend to find every last one of them. Are you with me?" {n}Xavier's drink is as dark as the expanses of the galaxy yet unconquered by Humanity and as strong as the faith of the righteous. Ordinary amasec in a soldier's flask, unadorned save for the Aquila.{/n}
